name: AI Voice Agents
description: AI Voice Agents is a platform designed to create, license, and monetize personalized voice models. It provides users with tools to interact with voice-enabled AI agents, build custom talking agents, and securely own and monetize their voices using blockchain technology. The project focuses on redefining the use of voices in digital spaces by addressing issues such as monetization challenges, inefficiencies in traditional voiceover services, and the limited capabilities of text-only AI solutions.
